TalentsTiers.Name: Ferocity
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the cost of your Maul, Swipe, Claw, Rake and Mangle abilities by [@value] Rage or Energy.

TalentsTiers.Name: Feral Aggression
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the Attack Power reduction of your Demoralizing Roar by [@value]% and the damage caused by your Ferocious Bite by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Feral Instinct
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage done by your Swipe ability by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Savage Fury
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage caused by your Claw, Rake, Mangle (Cat), Mangle (Bear) and Maul abilities by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Thick Hide
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your Armor contribution from items by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Feral Swiftness
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your movement speed by [@value]% in Cat Form and increases your chance to dodge while in Cat Form, Bear Form and Dire Bear Form by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Survival Instincts
TalentsTiers.Description:
Instant
5 min cooldown

When activated, this ability temporarily grants you 30% of your maximum health for 20 sec while in Bear Form, Cat Form, or Dire Bear Form. After the effect expires, the health is lost.

TalentsTiers.Name: Sharpened Claws
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your critical strike chance while in Bear, Dire Bear or Cat Form by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Shredding Attacks
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the energy cost of your Shred ability by [@value] and the rage cost of your Lacerate ability by [@value2].

TalentsTiers.Name: Predatory Strikes
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your melee attack power in Cat, Bear an Dire Bear Forms by [@value]% of your level and [@value2]% of any attack power on your equipped weapon. In addition , your finishing moves have a [@value3]% chance per combo point to make your next nature spell with base casting time less than [@value4] sec. become an instant cast spell.

TalentsTiers.Name: Primal Fury
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives you a [@value]% chance to gain an additional [@value3] Rage anytime you get a critical strike while in Bear and Dire Bear Form and your critical strikes from Cat Form abilities that add combo points have a [@value2]% chance to add an additional combo point.

TalentsTiers.Name: Primal Precision
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your expertise by [@value2], and you are refunded [@value]% of the energy cost of a finishing move if it fails to land.

TalentsTiers.Name: Brutal Impact
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the stun duration of your Bash and Pounce abilities by [@value] sec and decreases the cooldown of Bash by [@value2] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Feral Charge
TalentsTiers.Description:
Teaches Feral Charge (Bear) and Feral Charge (Cat).

Feral Charge (Bear) - Causes you to charge an enemy, immobilizing and interrupting any spell being cast for 4 sec. This ability can be used in Bear Form and Dire Bear Form. 15 second cooldown.

Feral Charge (Cat) - Causes you to leap behind an enemy, dazing them for 3 sec. 30 second cooldown.

TalentsTiers.Name: Nurturing Instinct
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your healing spells by up to [@value]% of your Agility, and increases healing done to you by [@value2]% while in Cat form. This effect does not stack with other similar effects.

TalentsTiers.Name: Natural Reaction
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your dodge while in Bear Form or Dire Bear Form by [@value]%, and you regenerate [@value2] rage everytime you dodge while in Bear Form or Dire Bear Form.

TalentsTiers.Name: Heart of the Wild
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your Intellect by [@value]%. In addition, while in Bear or Dire Bear Form your Stamina is increased by [@value2]% and while in Cat Form your attack power is increased by [@value3]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Survival of the Fittest
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases all attributes by [@value2]% and reduces the chance you'll be critically hit by melee attacks by [@value3]% and increases your armor contribution from cloth and leather items in Bear Form and Dire Bear Form by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Leader of the Pack
TalentsTiers.Description: While in Cat, Bear or Dire Bear Form, the Leader of the Pack increases ranged and melee critical chance of all party members within 100 yards by 5%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Leader of the Pack
TalentsTiers.Description: Your Leader of the Pack ability also causes affected targets to heal themselves for [@value]% of their total health when they critically hit with a melee or ranged attack. The healing effect cannot occur more than once every [@value2] sec. In addition, you gain [@value3]% of your maximum mana when you benefit from this heal.

TalentsTiers.Name: Primal Tenacity
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the duration of Fear effects by [@value]%, and reduces all damage taken while Stunned by [@value2]% while in Cat Form.

TalentsTiers.Name: Protector of the Pack
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your attack power in Bear Form and Dire Bear Form by [@value]% and the damage you take is reduced by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Predatory Instincts
TalentsTiers.Description: While in Cat Form increases your damage from melee critical strikes by [@value]% and reduces the damage taken from area of effect attacks by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Infected Wounds
TalentsTiers.Description: Your Shred, Maul and Mangle attacks cause an Infected Wound in the target. The Infected Wound reduces the movement speed of the target by [@value]% and the attack speed by [@value2]%. Lasts [@value3] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: King of the Jungle
TalentsTiers.Description: While using your Enrage ability in Bear form or Dire Bear form, your damage is increased by [@value]%, and your Tiger's Fury ability also instantly restores [@value2] energy. In addition the mana cost of Bear Form, Cat Form and Dire Bear Form is reduced by [@value3]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Mangle
TalentsTiers.Description: Mangle the target, inflicting damage and causing the target to take additional damage from bleed effects for 1 min. This ability can be used in Cat Form or Dire Bear Form.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Mangle
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Mangle (Bear) ability by [@value] sec., and reduces the energy cost of your Mangle (Cat) ability by [@value2].

TalentsTiers.Name: Rend and Tear
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases damage done by your Maul and Shred attacks on bleeding targets by [@value]%, and increases the critical strike chance of your Ferocious Bite ability on bleeding targets by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Primal Gore
TalentsTiers.Description: Grants the periodic damage from your Lacerate and Rip abilities the ability to critically hit.

TalentsTiers.Name: Berserk
TalentsTiers.Description:
Instant
3 min cooldown

When activated, this ability causes your Mangle (Bear) ability to hit up to 3 targets and have no cooldown, and reduces the energy cost of all your Cat Form abilities by 50%. Lasts 15 sec. You cannot use Tiger's Fury while Berserk is active.

Clears the effect of Fear and makes you immune to Fear for the duration.
